cause.description:
We aim to send this biggoted poopyface some boxes, it doesnt really harm him in any way, they just have to go through the trouble of throwing them out.
Its fun, contact info is available in my AIM profile, Directions to follow
First,
Go to USPS store online, order boxes online, use fred phelps mailing address in my aim profile, ???, PROFIT!
1. send fred phelps boxes
2. ????
3. PROFIT!!
cause.name: Send Rev. Fred Phelps Some Boxes
